body: I know I might sound like a noob, but can some please tell me how to apply for staff?
body_tagged: I know I might sound like a noob, but can some please tell me how to apply for staff?
title: Staff Apps?

replies.body: The  staff apps are closed right now.
replies.body_tagged: The  staff apps are closed right now.

replies.body: Apps are closed. When they open, you must write a detailed essay XD. Also, you need at least 100 posts on the forums.
replies.body_tagged: Apps are closed. When they open, you must write a detailed essay XD. Also, you need at least 100 posts on the forums.

replies.body:
Any hint on when? It was suggested to be middle of August but August is just ending. 

Personally I think the server could use some more staff. It's not too bad but a few more people couldn't do much harm.
